text:
="preserve">Tomasz Piotr Tomiak (17 September 1967 – 21 August 2020) was a Polish rower. He was born in Nowy Tomyśl, Poland. He won a bronze medal during the 1992 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal in 1991 and a silver medal in 1993 at the World Rowing Championships.
Tomiak died on 21 August 2020 of heart failure in Warsaw at the age of 52.
